div.p: R68/7768, unit 339, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Arial; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Arial; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;

div.p: I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of two copies of Major Beddomes work on Indian ferns, part 20, which you were kind to send to this establishment, where they will be deposited in the Library.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Arial; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,
